album.title: Keeps Gettin' Better: A Decade Of Hits (International Edition)

wiki.content: Dirrty" is a song by Christina Aguilera featuring rapper Reggie "Redman" Noble. The song was written by Aguilera and Redman along with Jasper Cameron, Balewa Muhammad, and Rockwilder for Aguilera's second studio album Stripped. It received mixed reviews from music critics. It was nominated for "Best Pop Collaboration with Vocals" at the 45th Grammy Awards, but lost out to Santana and Michelle Branch's "The Game of Love". The song is best remembered for its accompanying music video, for which Aguilera was allowed creative control. The video brought her sexuality to the forefront and depicted various sexual fetishes, from mud wrestling to sthenolagnia. It eliminated the teenybopper, "girl next door" image that she had accumulated from the Genie in Bottle era. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

It was nominated for "Best Pop Collaboration with Vocals" at the 45th Grammy Awards, but lost out to Santana and Michelle Branch's "The Game of Love".

track.name: Dirrty
comments: "It's about time for my arrival!" This song is SO ahead of it's time!
If a persons clothing was coming off due to sweat it might be more like decomposition.
I really am curious if anyone will be able to top Dirrty this century or will this song released back in 2002, remain the naughtiest and raunchiest tune & video of 21st century!
Too dirty to clean my act up ♥
